TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pacuya, title = Pacuya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacuya} }

S.FORM: Pacuya Itiniay i Fuli Cen no Hualien ko Pacuya a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 101 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 56% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 57 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 44% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 44 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 36%, Bunun 19%, roma 2%.

Pacoya Itiniay i Foli Cen no Hoalien ko Pacoya a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 101 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 56% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 57 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 44% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 44 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 36%, Bonon 19%, roma 2%.
